data.eml:eml: Description of immatures of Stolas aenea (Olivier, 1790) and Stolas nudicollis (Boheman, 1850) (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae: Mesomphaliini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Leocádio, Michele, Mermudes, José Ricardo M. (2019): Description of immatures of Stolas aenea (Olivier, 1790) and Stolas nudicollis (Boheman, 1850) (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae: Mesomphaliini). Zootaxa 4545 (1): 61-76, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4545.1.3
